mapper.select: SELECT RIGHT(d.deliveryCode,3) AS deliveryCode ,RIGHT(c.contractCode,3) AS contractCode ,RIGHT(d.shipmentPlanCode,3) AS shipmentPlanCode ,RIGHT(d.returnRegCode,3) AS returnRegCode ,c.clientCode ,c.businessName AS clientBusinessName ,d.deliveryBusinessCode ,cl.businessName AS deliveryBusinessName ,d.receiveAddr ,d.deliveryCost ,d.briefs ,d.managerId ,u.userName AS managerName ,LEFT(d.updateDate,10) AS updateDate FROM k1_tb_delivery AS d LEFT JOIN k1_tb_shipment_plan AS s ON d.shipmentPlanCode = s.shipmentPlanCode LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.contractCode ,c.clientCode ,cl.businessName FROM k1_tb_contract AS c JOIN k1_tb_client AS cl ON c.clientCode = cl.clientCode ) AS c ON s.contractCode = c.contractCode LEFT JOIN k1_tb_client AS cl ON d.deliveryBusinessCode = cl.clientCode JOIN k1_tb_user AS u ON d.managerId = u.userId WHERE d.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT RIGHT(d.deliveryCode,3) AS deliveryCode ,RIGHT(d.shipmentPlanCode,3) AS shipmentPlanCode ,RIGHT(d.returnRegCode,3) AS returnRegCode ,d.deliveryBusinessCode ,c.businessName AS deliveryBusinessName ,RIGHT(s.contractCode,3) AS contractCode ,s.clientCode ,s.businessName AS clientBusinessName ,d.receiveAddr ,RIGHT(a.stockAdjCode,3) AS stockAdjCode ,a.stockReasonCode ,a.stockReason ,d.deliveryCost ,d.briefs ,d.managerId ,u.userName AS managerName ,d.regDate ,d.updateDate FROM k1_tb_delivery AS d JOIN k1_tb_user AS u ON d.managerId = u.userId LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.shipmentPlanCode ,s.contractCode ,c.clientCode ,cl.businessName FROM k1_tb_shipment_plan AS s JOIN k1_tb_contract AS c ON s.contractCode = c.contractCode JOIN k1_tb_client AS cl ON c.clientCode = cl.clientCode ) AS s ON d.shipmentPlanCode = s.shipmentPlanCode JOIN k1_tb_client AS c ON d.deliveryBusinessCode = c.clientCode LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.deliveryCode ,stockAdjCode ,a.stockReasonCode ,r.reason AS stockReason FROM k1_tb_stock_adjustment AS a JOIN k1_tb_stock_reason AS r ON a.stockReasonCode = r.stockReasonCode ) AS a ON d.deliveryCode = a.deliveryCode WHERE d.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode} AND d.deliveryCode = CONCAT('deliveryCode_',#{deliveryCode});

SELECT RIGHT(p.inventoryCode,3) AS inventoryCode ,i.itemName ,p.itemCount AS adjCount ,p.itemWeight AS adjWeight ,p.totalPrice ,RIGHT(s.warehouseCode,3) AS sendWarehouse ,w.warehouseName AS sendWarehouseName ,w.location AS sendWarehouseLocation ,w.outPlace AS sendWarehouseOutPlace ,p.`comment` FROM k1_tb_shipment_plan_detail AS p JOIN k1_tb_stock AS s ON p.inventoryCode = s.inventoryCode JOIN k1_tb_item_info AS i ON s.itemCode = i.itemCode LEFT JOIN k1_tb_warehouse_info AS w ON s.warehouseCode = w.warehouseCode WHERE shipmentPlanCode = CONCAT('shipmentPlanCode_',#{shipmentPlanCode});

SELECT RIGHT(r.returnRegCode,3) AS returnRegCode ,RIGHT(r.itemCode,3) AS itemCode ,i.itemName ,r.amount ,r.`count` as adjCount ,(r.amount * r.`count`) AS totalPrice ,r.`comment` FROM k1_tb_return_reg_detail AS r JOIN k1_tb_item_info AS i ON r.itemCode = i.itemCode WHERE r.returnRegCode = CONCAT('returnRegCode_',#{returnRegCode});
